title: Mad Men
description: Set in 1960s New York City, this award-winning series takes a peek inside an ad agency during an era when the cutthroat business had a glamorous lure.

title: Mad Money
description: A woman joins the janitorial staff of the Federal Reserve Bank and conspires with two co-workers to pilfer old money that's scheduled to be destroyed.

title: Madagascar
description: This nature series places viewers in the heart of remote Madagascar, where the vast majority of the wildlife is unique to the island.
actors: David Attenborough

title: Madam Secretary
description: When a highly capable woman becomes secretary of state, she struggles to find balance between the demands of world politics and those of her family.
actors: Téa Leoni, Tim Daly, Bebe Neuwirth, Zeljko Ivanek

title: Made in Mexico
description: These Mexico City socialites may lead opulent lives, but a peek behind the curtain reveals a tangled web of intrigue, envy and personal struggles.

description: The Magi who became High King of the Seven Seas started as a boy determined to make the world a better place. He begins with a dangerous dungeon.
actors: Daisuke Ono, Tomokazu Sugita, Takahiro Sakurai, Keiji Fujiwara

description: A land of mysterious ruins and a magical treasure hunt await young Aladdin and his courageous friend Alibaba for the adventure of their lives.

title: Magic for Humans
description: From baffling people on the street to orchestrating elaborate tricks, Justin Willman blends good-natured magic with grown-up laughs.

title: Mak Cun

description: Filmed over 13 years, this real-life thriller follows the unprecedented story of two men accused of a grisly crime they may not have committed.

description: Faced with few clues and an increasingly panicked public, the FBI calls on a new kind of profiler to help track down the infamous Unabomber.
actors: Sam Worthington, Paul Bettany, Chris Noth, Jeremy Bobb

title: Maniac
description: A nondescript man in a mental hospital has an exciting life of adventure and romance -- in his head. He may be insane, or maybe he's just having fun.
actors: Espen Petrus Andersen Lervaag, Håkon Bast Mossige, Arif Salum, Ingeborg Raustøl

title: Maniac
description: Two struggling strangers connect during a mind-bending pharmaceutical trial involving a doctor with mother issues and an emotionally complex computer.
actors: Emma Stone, Jonah Hill, Justin Theroux, Sally Field

description: In a town in southern Spain where racial tensions run high among the workers in its many greenhouses, a cop investigates the murder of a young woman.

description: A former Marine out to punish the criminals responsible for his family's murder finds himself ensnared in a military conspiracy.

description: Masha explains why there's no need to be scared of things like monsters, the dark, going to a new school, thunder and other common childhood fears.

description: Fairy tales get a funny twist when Masha retells them, because she tends to get the details just a little jumbled up in this animated kids' series.

description: Follow engineering teams as they build the most dangerous, complex and amazing structures in modern history, using the latest scientific techniques.

title: My Little Pony: Happy Birthday to You!
description: Did somepony say "birthday"? Fluttershy and Pinkie Pie have a special party prepared just for you. Happy birthday from all of Equestria!

title: My Only Love Song
description: When things don't go her way during a shooting for her new show, a top actress runs away in an old van that guides her on a time-traveling journey.
actors: Seung-yeon Gong, Jong-hyun Lee, Yeon-seo Kim, Bo-hyun Ahn

title: My Runway
description: An egotistic top male model and a pretty model wannabe are forced to live each other's lives until they figure out a way to undo their body switch.
actors: Park Ji-yeon, Dong-ho Kang, Chul-woong Kang, Bo-hyun Ahn

title: My Teacher, My Obsession
description: When Riley changed schools, she didn't expect the girls to crush on her English teacher dad. And he didn't expect a disturbing infatuation.
actors: Lucy Loken, Laura Bilgeri, Rusty Joiner, Alexandria Deberry

title: My Wife Is a Gangster 3: HK Edition
description: Wrongfully accused of murder, the formidable daughter of a triad boss flees to South Korea and winds up under the protection of a bumbling gangster.
actors: Qi Shu, Lee Beom-su, Hyun Young, Oh Ji-ho

title: Mystery Science Theater 3000
description: The cult hit returns! Captured by mad scientists, new host Jonah survives a blitz of cheesy B movies by riffing on them with his funny robot pals.
actors: Felicia Day, Patton Oswalt, Jonah Ray, Baron Vaughn

title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 Collection : Classic
description: Hosts Joel and Mike and their robot companions offer hilarious running commentary on B movies they're forced to watch in these classic MST3K episodes.
actors: Joel Hodgson, Michael J. Nelson, Kevin Murphy, Trace Beaulieu

title: Mystic Whispers
description: After a car accident enables a young woman to hear mysterious sounds, she meets a mortician. Together, they listen to ghosts and try to help them.
actors: Romeo Tan, Sheila Sim, Yuan Shuai, Aloysius Pang

title: Myths & Monsters
description: This documentary series takes us to the mythic landscapes of Europe to explore some of most enduring legends produced by European culture.
actors: Nicholas Day
